p: Unfed male and female Ae. aegypti mosquitoes had a mean fructose value of 0.46 µg (±0.32) and 0.79 µg (±0.28), respectively ( Supp Table 1 [online only]). Conversely, male and females 24-h post sugar feeding had mean fructose values of 1.19 µg (±0.49) and 4.65 µg (±0.48), respectively. Mean fructose content for blood-fed female Ae. aegypti was 3.72 µg (±0.31) and 3.59 µg (±0.53) for gravid females, decreasing to a mean of 2.33 µg (±0.42) for females post-oviposition.
